columns_home_index.title: Track your dividends
columns_home_index.description: Import your trading history, then sit back and watch as corporate actions such as dividends and share splits are automatically incorporated.

columns_home_index.title: Know your true performance
columns_home_index.description: Understand exactly how your investments are performing with daily price & currency updates, plus powerful reports and optional email alerts.

columns_home_index.title: Save time and money
columns_home_index.description: Share access to your portfolio and tax reports with your accountant in a few clicks and you’ll be on your way to saving time and money during tax time.

columns_pro_index.title: End shoebox syndrome
columns_pro_index.description: Badgering clients for trade confirmations and dividend statements? Staff struggling with stale spreadsheets? Having everything in one place puts an end to file-chasing and ensures everyone’s on the same page.

columns_pro_index.title: Simplify portfolio admin
columns_pro_index.description: Imagine client portfolios that are always up-to-date with the latest trade, currency and corporate action data. Use your new-found time to attract new clients, or claim back some hours in your day.

columns_pro_index.title: Deepen client relationships
columns_pro_index.description: With tax and performance reporting taken care of, you’ll have more time for more rewarding, pro-active activities such as tax planning and forward-looking investment discussions.
